properties.name: security.client-id
properties.description: The client ID used for OAuth2 authentication. This ID is provided by the authorization server and uniquely identifies the client application.

properties.name: security.client-secret
properties.description: The client secret used for OAuth2 authentication. This secret is provided by the authorization server and is used to authenticate the client application during the token request process.

properties.name: security.jwt.duration
properties.description: The duration (in seconds) for which the JWT (JSON Web Token) remains valid. This value determines the expiration time of the token after it is issued.

properties.name: cors.origins
properties.description: A comma-separated list of allowed origins for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). These origins are permitted to access the resources of this application.
